Class ProcessLogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • re.alwyn974.openlauncherlib.util.ProcessLogManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ProcessLogManager
extends java.lang.Thread
    The Process Log Manager

    Manager logs of a Process by printing and/or writing them.

    Version:
    3.0.2-BETA
    Author:
    Litarvan
    See Also:
    Process
